summary: DOI that fails validation even after cleanup and does not resolve via Crossref or doi.org. Represents ~1.1% of malformed DOIs - truly phantom/never-registered DOIs.
notes: From PDF section 7.4: After testing 91 failed DOIs, only 1 was truly unresolvable (phantom DOI never registered). Rate: ~1.1% of the ~20k malformed DOIs (~220 DOIs), not of the entire corpus. These DOIs pass pattern matching but don't exist in any registry. Options: (1) Mark UNSEARCHABLE, (2) Queue for human review, (3) Attempt title-only dedup with low confidence threshold. Current approach: rely on ES+Jaccard fallback when DOI short-circuit fails.
